content: no need to fear the fire of this darling dragon that s sure to become a hit with any child made endearing in our squishy bernat blanket yarn you ll practice single_crochet chain slip_stitch plus sewing/assembly techniques to create your crochet toy make it as designed or give donald a whacky personality using colors of your choice this irresistible new friend is extra soft and cozy - the perfect pal for kids of all ages yarns for model bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a dark teal 10825 1 ball or 132 yds/121 m contrast b misty green 10878 1 ball or 26 yds/24 m contrast c vintage white 10006 1 ball or 9 yds/8 5 m materials 2 black safety eyes 1 2 5 cm stuffing yarn needle
